name: XULDesktop
short_description: XULDesktop is an attempt to create a complete Desktop Environment built upon the OpenBox window manager using only XUL and XPCOM technologies.  The idea is for the Desktop system to be as slim as possible while being almost completely configurable by the end user.   The entire project will consist of an OpenBox theme implementing XUL start/dock application, a XUL file manager (this should be relatively simple using native XUL & XPCOM methods), related applets to manage common tasks for a desktop environment, and, of course, a unique base theme for window decoration and aesthetic
summary: A slim, XUL based Desktop environment for any *nix OS
